title: Cognitive Engagement Activities - Memory Games for Mental Stimulation
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to engage in memory games tailored for my cognitive abilities so that I can remain mentally active and connected while managing my arthritis pain.

title: Gentle Stretching and Mobility Exercises Guidance
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to provide gentle stretching and mobility exercises so that I can stay physically active and manage my arthritis pain while being mindful of my limited mobility.

title: Customizable Activity Difficulty
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to have adjustable difficulty levels for cognitive and physical activities so that I can engage in challenges that suit my current abilities without feeling overwhelmed or discouraged.

summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to remind me to hydrate and eat regularly so that I can maintain my physical health while managing my arthritis pain and busy schedule.

summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to suggest volunteer opportunities based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and continue to contribute to my community despite my limited mobility.

title: Guided Meditation for Active Living
summary: As a retired social worker, I want access to guided meditation tools so that I can manage my arthritis pain and maintain my mental well-being while staying physically active.

title: Personalized Progress Tracking – Goal-Setting for Achievements
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to set personal goals for physical and cognitive activities so that I can track my progress and maintain my independence while staying active and engaged.
